abilities.text: Passive - when this Personnel is deployed: Add 1 CC to this Personnel
Passive - at end of phase: Add 1 CC to this Personnel
Passive - Once per round, at end of round: you may remove 1 CC from this Personnel
Passive - when sector Alpha is breached: Flip sector Alpha to Secure
Passive - when an Entity's effect resolves in sector Beta: Add 1 CC to each Personnel in sector Beta
